name: Kit the Cat and Barry the Bird!
name_original: Kit the Cat and Barry the Bird!
description:
Control two characters simultaneously, and use their unique abilities to complete platforming levels as fast as you can! Kit the Cat and Barry the Bird has you play as a Cat and a Bird simultaneously as you attempt to complete each level as quickly as possible. Avoid spikes and guard dogs as you make your way across each level, and use each character to solve puzzles as you go.

IMPORTANT: A controller that can be plugged into your computer via USB works best for this game, Xbox and PlayStation controllers work best for this. This game will NOT work correctly with just a mouse and a keyboard.

Disclaimer: This game is a demo, it is short and might have bugs in it, but if you like it or you run into any bugs, feel free to message me on my Twitter @matthew_gigante .

*Song used in game is "Tintin on the Moon" by Jeroen Tel
